data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Dâmbovița, Romania a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dâmbovița, Romania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Dâmbovița, Romania.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Dâmbovița prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 425,278 cultural Christians in the state of Dâmbovița to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Dâmbovița to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 30,825 believers in Dâmbovița against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.section_summary:
the state of Dâmbovița, Romania has a population of 487,000.

We estimate Dâmbovița has 30,825 people who might know Jesus, 425,278 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 30,897 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: There are 487,000 people living in the state of Dâmbovița. Only about 30,825 might be believers.
